Title: The hunger strike to end AI
Description:
On Guido Reichstadter's 17th day without eating, he said he was feeling alright - moving a little slower, but alright.
Each day since September 2nd, Reichstadtler has appeared outside the San Francisco headquarters of AI startup Anthropic, standing from aroun…

Title: Do You Really Need a New Apple Watch If You Already Have One?
Description: I took a closer look at Apple's new Sleep Score and hypertension notification features for Apple Watch.

Title: Google's new Pixel accessory is here — and it's surprisingly affordable
Description: Google launched its "Rope Wristlet" accessory for its Pixel phones on its official store.

Title: Kirk's alleged shooter faces death penalty. And, Pritzker concerned for 2026 elections
Description:
Tyler Robinson, the 22-year-old accused of shooting and killing Charlie Kirk, faces the death penalty in Utah.
And, Illinois Gov.
JB Pritzker talks about why he is worried about the 2026 elections

Title: The founder of $2 billion AI website builder Framer says this is what designers should focus on to thrive in the age of AI
Description:
Jorn van Dijk cofounded Framer, an AI website builder.
He said designers should continue to refine their taste even with the rise of AI-powered tools.

Title: 'It's scary for us': Gun violence, safety concerns keep these visitors from the US
Description:
Some travelers are minimizing time spent in the U.S.
or avoiding it altogether due to gun violence and other safety fears.

Title: Storm halt Aces' 17-game win streak, force Game 3
Description:
The Storm handed the Aces their first loss since Aug.
2, rallying from a 14-point deficit in the second half Tuesday night to win Game 2 of their first-round series 86-83 and force a deciding Game 3 on Thursday in Las Vegas.

Title: Ozempic May Be Less Effective for Emotional Eaters, Study Suggests
Description: Researchers investigated why some people don’t respond as well to GLP-1 drugs and found that the reasons behind their overeating might play a role.

Title: What the Video of Charlie Kirk’s Murder Might Do
Description: Jay Caspian Kang writes that, with less and less parental control over what our children see, they will likely understand history, and the world, very differently than we do.

Title: Timor-Leste scraps plan to buy MPs free cars after protests
Description: Demonstrators had burned tyres and set a government vehicle alight, while police responded with tear gas.

Title: Climate Change Fuels Record Summer Heat, Killing Thousands
Description: Climate-fueled heat has caused thousands of excess deaths over the past three summers, which were the three hottest on record

Title: New Research Shows Gut Cells Communicate Directly with the Brain
Description: Scientists are uncovering how your gut might be shaping your thoughts, feelings and cravings.

Title: Cardi B Is Pregnant Again!
Description: Cardi has two buns in the oven: a new album and a new baby.
